entry.title: Relay on Django Coexists with React
entry.summary:
Description

With React becoming the standard for frontends, how should Python backends follow suit? Let's learn how to support GraphQL and Relay specs for collaboration with frontends.

Kang Jeong-seok I am a software engineer at Labup Inc. I started programming with Python and have been using it with passion ever â€¦
entry.content:
Description

With React becoming the standard for frontends, how should Python backends follow suit? Let's learn how to support GraphQL and Relay specs for collaboration with frontends.

Kang Jeong-seok I am a software engineer at Labup Inc. I started programming with Python and have been using it with passion ever since.
